contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 24, 2016 D Fife Charities Band Association Contest
Fife Charities Band Association Contest 1 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest (Separate Points) Fife Charities Band Association Contest fife-charities-band-association-contest
None
Adam Smith Theatre, Kirkcaldy, Fife, Scotland, UK Adjudicator: Steve Pritchard Jones and John Boax (Solo prizes)
Best Fife A Band: Tullis Russell Mills Best Fife B Band: Dysart Colliery
Best First Section Band: Tullis Russell Mills Best Second Section Band: Emley Brass Best Third Section Band: Tullis Russell Intermediate Best Fourth Section Band: Dysart Colliery
Best Cornet: David Cooper (Bon Accord Silver) Best Horn/Flugel: Sarah Findlay (flugel) Kingdom Brass Best Euphonium: Richard Kidd (Bon Accord Silver) Best Trombone: Mark Boyd (Bon Accord Silver) Best Basses: Bon Accord Silver Best Percussion: Bon Accord Silver
March Winners: Bon Accord Hymn Tune Winners: Bon Accord
Sept. 30, 2016, 9:45 a.m. Oct. 1, 2016, 4:45 p.m.
1 Bon-Accord Silver Band Steve Malcolm St. Magnus
2 Tullis Russell Mills Paul Kiernan Ballet for Band
